name: many_phrases
description: I like using long wordy passwords - they are easy to remember. My problem right now is that they need to be renewed monthly, but I cannot repeat them. It takes me too much to think of a new one
event: People's memorable ideas get exausted and they start using external references to generate their passwords.
consequences: It takes some effort to observe someone to understand what technique they use to generate their passwords and where to get the next phrase from.
